quote: Chess is the struggle against one's own errors.
name: Johannes Zukertort

quote: Chess is life in miniature.
name: Garry Kasparov

quote: The pawns are the soul of chess.
name: Philidor

quote: In life, as in chess, forethought wins.
name: Charles Buxton

quote: Chess is mental torture.
name: Garry Kasparov

quote: Play the opening like a book, the middle game like a magician, and the endgame like a machine.
name: Rudolf Spielmann

quote: Chess is a unique cognitive nexus, a place where art and science come together in the human mind and are then refined and improved by experience.
name: Garry Kasparov

quote: The chessboard is the world, the pieces are the phenomena of the universe, the rules of the game are what we call the laws of Nature and the player on the other side is hidden from us.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: Chess is the gymnasium of the mind.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Chess holds its master in its own bonds, shackling the mind and brain so that the inner freedom of the very strongest must suffer.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: To avoid losing a piece, many a person has lost their game.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: When you see a good move, look for a better one.
name: Emanuel Lasker

quote: Strategy requires thought, tactics require observation.
name: Max Euwe

quote: Chess is a cold bath for the mind.
name: Sir John Simon

quote: You may learn much more from a game you lose than from a game you win.
name: José Capablanca

quote: Chess is the art which expresses the science of logic.
name: Mikhail Botvinnik

quote: If your opponent offers you a draw, try to work out why he thinks he’s worse off.
name: Nigel Short

quote: Chess is like life. Sometimes it’s dangerous, sometimes it’s safe, but if you don’t take risks, you’ll never win.
name: Vladimir Kramnik

quote: You have to have the fighting spirit. You have to force moves and take chances.
name: Bobby Fischer

quote: In the perfect chess combination, as in a first-rate short story, the whole plot and counter-plot should lead up to a striking finale, the interest not being allayed until the very last moment.
name: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quote: Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.
name: Sun Tzu

quote: The chessboard is the best logical, strategic, and artistic object ever invented. And besides, who doesn’t like chess?
name: Gyula Breyer

quote: It is the aim of chess to make the weakest pawns the most powerful.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: Chess teaches you to control the initial excitement you feel when you see something that looks good and it trains you to think objectively when you're in trouble.
name: Stanley Kubrick

quote: Chess is life, the struggle, the effort, the failure, and the eternal searching for the truth.
name: Vasyl Ivanchuk

quote: Every chess master was once a beginner.
name: Irving Chernev

quote: Chess is imagination.
name: David Bronstein

quote: A bad plan is better than no plan at all.
name: Frank Marshall

quote: In chess, as in life, a man is his own most dangerous opponent.
name: Vassily Smyslov

quote: The beauty of chess is it can be whatever you want it to be. It transcends language, age, race, religion, politics, gender, and socioeconomic background. Whatever your circumstances, anyone can enjoy a good fight to the death over the chess board.
name: Simon Williams

quote: It is not enough to be a good player; you must also play well.
name: Siegbert Tarrasch

quote: In chess, just as in life, even the best-laid plans often go astray; a single slip can lead to disaster.
name: David LeMoir

quote: Openings teach you openings. Endings teach you chess!
name: Stephan Gerzadowicz

quote: The chessboard is the ultimate test to the human intellect.
name: David Bronstein

quote: Chess is an infinitely complex game, which one can play in infinitely numerous and varied ways.
name: Vladimir Kramnik

quote: It is always better to sacrifice your opponent's men.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: There are no perfect chess players; just really good ones.
name: Yasser Seirawan

quote: Chess is mental strength at the highest level.
name: Viswanathan Anand

quote: I feel as if I were a piece in a game of chess when my opponent says to me: That piece cannot be moved.
name: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: Chess makes men wiser and clear-sighted.
name: Vladimir Putin

quote: The ultimate goal in chess is to promote your pawn into a piece that can retire.
name: Larry Evans

quote: Chess is a cold-hearted mistress.
name: Wilhelm Steinitz

quote: The ability to play chess is the sign of a gentleman. The ability to play chess well is the sign of a wasted life.
name: Paul Morphy

quote: No one ever won a game by resigning.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: Chess is 30% tactics, 30% strategy, 30% psychology, and 10% everything else.
name: Kasparov

quote: Men and women alike love the game of chess for its intellectual challenge and fierce competition.
name: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: Only the player with the initiative has the right to attack.
name: Wilhelm Steinitz

quote: A passed pawn increases in strength as the number of pieces on the board diminishes.
name: Capablanca

quote: In chess, knowledge is a very transient thing.
name: Gary Lane

quote: I prefer to lose a really good game than to win a bad one.
name: David Levy

quote: Good positions don't win games, good moves do.
name: Gerald Abrahams

quote: Strategy is not a branch of mathematics but rather an art.
name: Max Euwe

quote: The winner of the game is the player who makes the next-to-last mistake.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: Chess is ruthless: you’ve got to be prepared to kill people.
name: Nigel Short

quote: There must be a bad move somewhere in a good game of chess.
name: Siegbert Tarrasch

quote: There are more adventures on a chessboard than on all the seas and all the pirates combined.
name: Pierre Mac Orlan

quote: In a gambit, as in life, you don't get nothing for nothing.
name: Frank Zappa

quote: Chess is a delicate balance between structure and chaos.
name: Walter de la Mare

quote: Chess is mental torture.
name: Magnus Carlsen

quote: Tactics is what you do when there is something to do; strategy is what you do when there is nothing to do.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: The hardest game to win is a won game.
name: Emanuel Lasker

quote: Pawn endings are to chess what putting is to golf.
name: Cecil Purdy

quote: If I win a tournament, I win it by myself. I do the playing. Nobody helps me.
name: Bobby Fischer

quote: When you play Bobby, it is not a question if you win or lose. It is a question if you survive.
name: Boris Spassky

quote: After each move, think twice.
name: Emanuel Lasker

quote: In chess, as in life, if one soldier protects the other, neither can be harmed.
name: Tolstoy

quote: Chess teaches you to control the initial excitement you feel when you see something that looks good and it trains you to think objectively when you're in trouble.
name: Stanley Kubrick

quote: Chess is a war over the board. The object is to crush the opponent's mind.
name: Bobby Fischer

quote: Pawn endings are to chess what putting is to golf.
name: Cecil Purdy

quote: One doesn't have to play well, it's enough to play better than your opponent.
name: Siegbert Tarrasch

quote: If your opponent offers you a draw, try to work out why he thinks he’s worse off.
name: Nigel Short

quote: The battle for the ultimate truth will never be won.
name: Michael Basman

quote: There are tough players and nice guys, and I'm a tough player.
name: Alexander Morozevich

quote: Chess is a mental torture.
name: Magnus Carlsen

quote: In chess, as in life, knowledge counts only by you being able to use it in full force.
name: Garry Kasparov

quote: When you don’t know what to play, wait for an inspiration. Chess is imagination.
name: David Bronstein

quote: You have to play against nature, not with it.
name: Alexander Alekhine

quote: Some part of a mistake is always correct.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: Chess doesn’t drive people mad, it keeps mad people sane.
name: Bill Hartston

quote: The winner of the game is the player who makes the next-to-last mistake.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: Logic takes you from A to B, but imagination takes you everywhere.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Only the player with the initiative has the right to attack.
name: Wilhelm Steinitz

quote: Avoid the crowd. Do your own thinking independently. Be the chess player, not the chess piece.
name: Ralph Charell

quote: Blunders are always there, waiting to be made.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: All I want to do, ever, is just play chess.
name: Bobby Fischer

quote: Chess, like love, like music, has the power to make people happy.
name: Siegbert Tarrasch

quote: It’s always better to sacrifice your opponent’s men.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: Chess is not for timid souls.
name: Wilhelm Steinitz

quote: Tactics is knowing what to do when there is something to do; strategy is knowing what to do when there is nothing to do.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: There is no remorse like the remorse of chess.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: No one ever won a game by resigning.
name: Savielly Tartakower

quote: When you play Bobby, it is not a question if you win or lose. It is a question if you survive.
name: Boris Spassky

quote: You cannot play at chess if you are kind-hearted.
name: French Proverb

quote: Chess is the art of analysis.
name: Mikhail Botvinnik

quote: The best advice I can give to any chess player is: learn the endgame.
name: Mikhail Botvinnik
